abilities.title: Full Recovery
abilities.text: Choose an allied Unit within 3. The chosen Unit removes all and conditions from itself. Sprint Each character in this Unit may Precise Strike After this Unit makes a combat action, it may use this ability. Choose an allied Galactic Republic Supporting Unit within 3 of a character in this Unit. If the chosen Unit's Order Card is in the Order Deck, each character in that Unit may . If the chosen Unit's Order Card is not in the Order Deck, one character in the chosen Unit may make a 5 dice attack. Flow of the Force Once per Turn, when an enemy Unit becomes Wounded, after the effect is resolved, one allied character may . When an enemy character Wounds an allied Unit, after the effect is resolved, a character in another allied Unit may . You may look at the top card of your Order Deck before revealing an Order Card or choosing to activate a Unit from reserve.

abilities.title: Galactic Republic Supporting Unit
abilities.text: After this Unit makes a combat action, it may use this ability. Choose an allied  within 3 of a character in this Unit. If the chosen Unit's Order Card is in the Order Deck, each character in that Unit may . If the chosen Unit's Order Card is not in the Order Deck, one character in the chosen Unit may make a 5 dice attack.
